void * Server::dispatcherThreadMain (  void *  data  )  [static]
 

Main function of the dispatcher thread.

The dispatcher waits for a StratmasSocket (containing data about a connection) to be enqueued by the Server main thread. When this happens, the dispatcher creates a thread for handling the connection and gives that thread access to the correct Session object. The dispatcher keeps doing this until it dequeues a NULL pointer that indicates that it is ok to quit.

Parameters:
data A Server object.
Returns:
NULL if everything is ok.
